content: धृष् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (धर्षति, धर्षित) {@--1@} To come together, be compact. {@--2@} To hurt or injure. {vII.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (धर्षति, धर्षयति-ते) {@--1@} To offend, hurt, injure. {@--2@} To insult, treat with indignity. {@--3@} To assail, overcome, overpower, conquer, destroy. {@--4@} To dare to attack, challenge, defy. {@--5@} To violate or outrage (as a woman). {vIII.v} {c5c} <ab>P.</ab> (धृष्णोति, धृष्ट) {@--1@} To be bold or courageous. {@--2@} To be confident. {@--3@} To be proud or overbearing. {@--4@} To be impudent or impatient. {@--5@} To dare, venture (with <ab>inf.</ab>). {@--6@} To brave, challenge; <ls>Bk. 14. 102.</ls> {@--7@} To insult, treat with contumely. {vIV.v} {c10c} <ab>A.</ab> (धर्षयते) To assail, attack, outrage.
